title: Talk on Testing with Angular at Angular Hamburg Meetup.
Moderating AMA session with Igor Minar and Adam Bradley at AngularBeers
Google cross-posts my article on explaining future Angular release cycles on their official blog.
Attending NG-BE, Belgium's first Angular conference.
Angular 2 Forms - a first look gets published on the official Angular news site.
Angular 2 - A Getting Started Guide for Beginners gets ranked #1 among 1500 articles.
link: /blog/2016/06/ng2-getting-started-for-beginners/) gets [ranked #1 among more than 1500 Angular 2 articles](https://medium.mybridge.co/top-10-angular-2-articles-for-the-past-month-v-june-37bb96b667a3#.ss9xav5jn) in the range of May-June 2016 by [MyBridge](https://medium.mybridge.co/

title: The official Angular Twitter account starts following me!!! :)
I'm being mentioned by Rangle.io during their talk at NGConf 2016 for my contributions to Augury!
Talk: Angular 2 Special. Introduction to Angular 2, what it is about and some practical hands-on.
My video course 'Learning Angular 2 Directives' gets published.

Together with Christoph Piock and Peter Grader I founded a local meetup group around Software Craftsmanship. The goal is to revive the local tech community, foster communication and knowledge sharing.
